title: 5.30 99% patch fail
body:
it seems to have failed at 99% and got frustrated so I looked it up and some people in eu had the same issue so heres a quick fix for you if It happens to you ..........

restart the patcher and set your priority to high so it doesn't take 25 minutes to scan

windows - 8 task manager, right click patcher go to details, right click pathcer again set priority to high, it scanned in about 15 seconds.... hope it works for you

replies.body:
So, it can be fixed by allotting more resources to the patcher?

I can't be the only one who thinks that doesn't make any sense.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=AkNY5XFH,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-11T23:41:44.877+0000)
>
> So, it can be fixed by allotting more resources to the patcher?
> 
> I can't be the only one who thinks that doesn't make any sense.



I think its more to do with the fact that when you restart the patcher it has to scan all the files to find out where it stopped... 
by setting it to high priority you don't have to wait to scan 20 000 files for so long. instead of waiting 25 minutes to scan, mine scaned in 15 seconds... that's all its not a fix to the patch breaking but more of a quicker way to get back to the point it broke.

Ah, yeah, because scanning can take time of upwards from an hour to complete, with all the thousands upon thousands of files this game uses. So, if set to normal priority it would net the same result, but just take way longer.

Thanks for the explanation; I just like to know what I'm doing exactly before I do it.

No idea why but this fixed it by
step 1: downloading [http://www.mediafire.com/download/19i8fnbu2va56xt/S_OK.rar ](http://www.mediafire.com/download/19i8fnbu2va56xt/S_OK.rar )
step 2: going to C:\Games\League of Legends\RADS and deleting both the downloads and solutions folders(IMPORTANT if you do not delete them you might get stuck in a loop)
step 3: extracting the S_OK.rar into the latest folder in C:\Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.129 it is now 0.0.1.129 I think it was 0.0.1.126 or something

No idea why it works but it works for every single patch that keeps failiing, you just have to copy and paste it every time into the new folder

Hi Unrealz,

Thanks for posting a potential fix to this issue.

If any other players experience it please try this out but it would be great to know how many players are affected.

Is it normal to have like 3 identical LoLPatcherUx.exe*32's going at the same time? 

Currently have 5 LoL Related processes all set on high with 6,000 files scanned.

Will update if it works :)
Legit I think it's normal. The way it's been coded, I don't think old instances of the patcher are designed to terminate. BUT DON'T WORRY THE USUAL END-USER DOESN'T SEE THAT :D
Alright finished patching after 6,500 files scanned. Cheers and confirm this does work :)
